thread.title: David Barbara
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by David Barbara

author: David Barbara
title: David Barbara
text: It had been awhile since we got original cartridges for this whole house filter. This is in a rental and the former tenants had purchased some after markets. The difference in quality is very obvious at a glance. Yours are , hands down, much better.
